name: Andrew Cuttriss - Prototype
description:
Challenge 1: (Must have processing installed) Play the classic snake in processing as the seasons change around you. 

Challenge 2: Asteroid Toss, fling your asteroid into the target with your manipulation of gravity. 

Challenge 3:  Revenge Racer, Race against the AI for the best lap time you can, 

Challenge 4: Balloon Poppers (Requires Microphone) Pop as many balloons as possible with your voice.
